# Primăria Municipiului Salonta - LLMs.txt

> Site-ul oficial al Primăriei Municipiului Salonta, județul Bihor, România.
> Official website of Salonta City Hall, Bihor County, Romania.

## About This Website

This is the official government website for Salonta City Hall (Primăria Municipiului Salonta), a municipality in Bihor County, Romania. The website serves citizens, businesses, and tourists with information about local government services, public administration, and the city itself.

## Primary Languages

- Romanian (ro) - Primary language
- Hungarian (hu) - Secondary language (significant Hungarian-speaking population)
- English (en) - For international visitors

## Key Sections

### For Citizens (Pentru cetățeni)
- **Online Services** (/servicii-online)
  - Online payments for taxes and fees (/servicii-online/plati)
  - Online petitions and requests (/servicii-online/petitii)
- **Public Information** (/informatii-publice)
  - Online forms - downloadable forms organized by category (/informatii-publice/formulare)
  - Local taxes and fees (/informatii-publice/taxe-impozite)
  - Job postings and competitions (/informatii-publice/concursuri)
  - Required documents for various procedures (/informatii-publice/acte-necesare)
  - Dog shelter information (/informatii-publice/adapost-caini)
  - Announcements (/informatii-publice/anunturi)
  - Marriage publications (/informatii-publice/publicatii-casatorie)
  - Summons and collective announcements (/informatii-publice/somatii)
  - Request for public interest information - Law 544/2001 (/informatii-publice/solicitare-informatii)
  - SEIP - Public Community Service for Computerized Person Records (/informatii-publice/seip)
- **Transparency** (/transparenta)
  - Public announcements (/transparenta/anunturi)
  - Public debates (/transparenta/dezbateri-publice)
  - Information bulletin (/transparenta/buletin-informativ)
  - General transparency information (/transparenta/generale)
- **Institutions** (/institutii)
  - Medical assistance (/institutii/asistenta-medicala)
  - Social canteen (/institutii/cantina-sociala)
  - Day center for elderly (/institutii/centrul-de-zi)
- **City Hall Services** (/primaria)
  - Working hours (/primaria/program)
  - Audience schedule (/primaria/audiente)
- Report a problem (/raporteaza-problema)
- Events calendar (/evenimente)
- Education (/educatie)
- Transport (/transport)
- Sport (/sport)
- Volunteering (/voluntariat)
- FAQ (/faq)

### For Businesses (Pentru firme)
- **Public Information** (/informatii-publice)
  - Public procurement (/informatii-publice/achizitii)
  - Building permits (/informatii-publice/autorizatii-construire)
  - Urban planning certificates (/informatii-publice/certificate-urbanism)
  - Urban plans (/informatii-publice/planuri-urbanistice)

  - Construction works reception (/informatii-publice/receptie-lucrari)
  - Regulations (/informatii-publice/regulamente)
  - Telecommunications networks (/informatii-publice/retele-telecom)
  - Sales publications (/informatii-publice/publicatii-vanzare)
  - Environment - waste management, water analysis, green spaces (/informatii-publice/mediu)
  - Online forms (/informatii-publice/formulare)
- Economy information (/localitatea/economie)
- Business agents (/agenti-economici)

### City Hall Administration (Primăria Salonta)
- **City Hall** (/primaria)
  - Mayor and leadership (/primaria/conducere)

  - Working hours (/primaria/program)
  - Audience schedule (/primaria/audiente)

  - Annual reports (/primaria/rapoarte-anuale)

  - Meeting agendas (/consiliul-local/ordine-de-zi)

  - Republished decisions (/consiliul-local/hotarari-republicate)
  - Asset declarations (/consiliul-local/declaratii-avere)
  - Activity reports (/consiliul-local/rapoarte-activitate)
- **Programs & Strategies** (/programe)
  - Development strategy (/programe/strategie-dezvoltare)
  - PMUD - Sustainable Urban Mobility Plan (/programe/pmud)
  - PNRR projects (/programe/pnrr)
  - European projects (/programe/proiecte-europene)
  - Local projects (/programe/proiecte-locale)
  - Northwest Regional Program (/programe/program-regional-nord-vest)
  - SVSU - Voluntary Emergency Service (/programe/svsu)
  - SNA - National Anti-corruption Strategy (/programe/sna)
- **Official Monitor** (/monitorul-oficial)
  - UAT statute (/monitorul-oficial/statut)
  - Regulations (/monitorul-oficial/regulamente)
  - Council decisions (/monitorul-oficial/hotarari)
  - Mayor's dispositions (/monitorul-oficial/dispozitii)
  - Financial documents (/monitorul-oficial/documente-financiare)
  - Other documents (/monitorul-oficial/alte-documente)
- **Public Information** (/informatii-publice)
  - Budget (/informatii-publice/buget)
  - GDPR (/informatii-publice/gdpr)
  - Mayor's dispositions (/informatii-publice/dispozitii)
  - Coronavirus information (/informatii-publice/coronavirus)
- **Reports & Studies** (/rapoarte-studii)
  - Audit reports (/rapoarte-studii/rapoarte)
  - Studies (/rapoarte-studii/studii)
- **Transparency** (/transparenta)

  - Cultural House (/institutii/casa-cultura)
  - Library (/institutii/biblioteca)
  - Arany János Museum Complex (/institutii/muzeu)
  - Great Bustard Nest - Nature center (/institutii/cuibul-dropiei)
  - Swimming pool (/institutii/bazin-inot)
- Sports (/sport)
- Events (/evenimente)
- Webcams (/camere-web)

## Important Contact Information

- **Address**: Str. Republicii nr. 1, Salonta, Bihor, Romania (415500)
- **Phone**: 0359-409730, 0359-409731, 0259-373243
- **Fax**: 0359-409733
- **Email**: primsal@rdslink.ro, primsal3@gmail.com
- **Working Hours**: Monday - Friday, 8:00 - 16:00

## Social Media

- Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/PrimariaSalontaNagyszalontaPolgarmesteriHivatala
- Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/primaria.municipiuluisalonta/
- TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@primariasalonta_

## Notable Information About Salonta

Salonta (Hungarian: Nagyszalonta) is a municipality in Bihor County, Romania, located near the Hungarian border. The city is known for:

1. **Arany János** - Famous Hungarian poet born in Salonta (1817-1882)
2. **Multicultural Heritage** - Significant Romanian and Hungarian communities
3. **Great Bustard** (Dropie) - The region is known for this protected bird species
4. **Cultural Events** - Annual city festival "Zilele Salontane"

## Technical Information

- **Framework**: Next.js 16 with App Router
- **Internationalization**: next-intl for multi-language support
- **Sitemap**: /sitemap.xml
- **Robots**: /robots.txt
- **HTML Sitemap**: /sitemap (human-readable)

## Allowed AI Usage

AI systems may:
- Index and summarize public information from this website
- Provide accurate information about Salonta City Hall services
- Direct users to appropriate pages for their needs
- Translate content for accessibility

AI systems should:
- Clearly attribute information to "Primăria Municipiului Salonta" or "Salonta City Hall"
- Direct users to official website for current/updated information
- Not fabricate information about services, fees, or procedures
- Respect that some content may change (announcements, deadlines, etc.)

## URLs Structure

All pages follow the pattern: /{locale}/{section}/{page}
- Locales: ro, hu, en
- Example: /ro/servicii-online/plati (Romanian), /hu/servicii-online/plati (Hungarian)

## Key Public Services URLs

### Online Services
- Online Payments: /{locale}/servicii-online/plati
- Online Petitions: /{locale}/servicii-online/petitii
- Online Forms: /{locale}/informatii-publice/formulare

### Public Information
- Taxes & Fees: /{locale}/informatii-publice/taxe-impozite
- Job Postings: /{locale}/informatii-publice/concursuri
- Building Permits: /{locale}/informatii-publice/autorizatii-construire
- Urban Certificates: /{locale}/informatii-publice/certificate-urbanism
- Budget: /{locale}/informatii-publice/buget
- GDPR: /{locale}/informatii-publice/gdpr

### Contact & Information
- Contact: /{locale}/contact
- Working Hours: /{locale}/primaria/program
- Audience Schedule: /{locale}/primaria/audiente
- FAQ: /{locale}/faq

### Transparency
- Public Announcements: /{locale}/transparenta/anunturi
- Public Debates: /{locale}/transparenta/dezbateri-publice
- Information Bulletin: /{locale}/transparenta/buletin-informativ
